units.report: SS KXI followed by Japanese Torpedo Bomber at 53,76 near Kota Bharu
SS KXI followed by Japanese Torpedo Bomber at 53,76 near Kota Bharu

Morning Air attack on 16th Construction Regiment, at 88,56 (Chuhsien)
 
Weather in hex: Clear sky
 
Raid spotted at 19 NM, estimated altitude 19,000 feet.
Estimated time to target is 6 minutes
 
Japanese aircraft
      Ki-27b Nate x 8
      Ki-51 Sonia x 12
 
No Japanese losses
 
Aircraft Attacking:
      12 x Ki-51 Sonia bombing from 15000 feet
               Ground Attack:  4 x 50 kg GP Bomb
Radio call sign of xAKL Kennichi Maru detected at 73,87.
